reviewText: Deeply reminds and haunts us that so many children in the U.S. are hungry and suffer in many ways from it. It empowers us to do something to stop this senseless social problem!

I would recommend everyone see this video to understand what is happening in the "economic recovery" there are 1000's of families in this same situation living in motels. I work with a charity that helps assist people in this situation and this video hits home to what we see everyday.
